historyDescription: People have been using natural objects, such as tree stumps, rocks and moss, as furniture since the beginning of human civilization. Archaeological research shows that from around 30,000 years ago, people began constructing and carving their own furniture, using wood, stone, and animal bones.
furnitureDescription1: Furniture can be a product of design and is considered a form of decorative art. In addition to furniture's functional role, it can serve a symbolic or religious purpose. It can be made from many materials, including metal, plastic, and wood.
furnitureDescription2: Early furniture from this period is known from artwork such as a Venus figurine found in Russia, depicting the goddess on a throne. The first surviving extant furniture is in the homes of Skara Brae in Scotland, and includes cupboards, dressers and beds all constructed from stone.

0.title: What is your return policy?
0.answer: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase. Please ensure that items are in their original condition.

1.title: How do I track my order?
1.answer: You can track your order by visiting our website and entering your order number. You will be able to see the current status of your shipment.

2.title: What payment methods do you accept?
2.answer: We accept all major credit cards, as well as PayPal and Apple Pay.

3.title: How long does shipping take?
3.answer: Shipping times vary depending on your location and the shipping method you choose. Standard shipping typically takes 5-7 business days.

4.title: Do you offer any discounts or promotions?
4.answer: Yes, we frequently offer discounts and promotions. You can check our website or sign up for our newsletter to stay up-to-date on our latest offers.
